page.title: 09STONEY GROVES
page.content: Stoney Groves is a moderately sized farm belonging to a Mr Clayhills- Henderson. Across the way there is a croft called "Little Stoneygroves." This is surrounded by 14 acres of land which cultivates mainly root crops. The land belongs to a Mr Hamilton who also owns an area of woodland adjacent to his fields. The site and house are privately owned.The house itself is built to very modern standards and is presently owned by a Mr and Mrs Arnold who have resided here for the past 15 years. It is situated on a fairly busy country road which acts as a main routeway between Muirhead/Birkhill and the villages of Liff and Fowlis.
